exm.mng: pride, arrogance, conceited, proud of sth
to guard against pride and impatience (idiom); to remain modest and keep cool
no arrogance in victory, no despair in defeat
exm.pyn: shèng bù jiāo , bài bù něi

exm.cur: 虚心使人进步，骄傲使人落后
exm.trd: 虛心使人進步，驕傲使人落後
exm.mng: Modesty leads to progress, arrogance makes you drop behind (favorite slogan of Mao Zedong)
exm.pyn: xū xīn shǐ rén jìn bù , jiāo ào shǐ rén luò hòu

exm.mng: no arrogance in victory, no despair in defeat
exm.pyn: shèng bù jiāo , bài bù něi

exm.mng: worthy of pride, impressive, enviable, to show contempt for others
lit. an arrogant army is bound to lose (idiom), fig. pride goes before a fall
variant of 驕奢淫逸|骄奢淫逸[jiao1 she1 yin2 yi4]
